B2 If someone is retired, they have stopped working permanently, usually because of age: Both my parents are retired. He is a retired airline pilot.
More examplesFewer examplesNow he's retired he spends most afternoons exercising his dogs.The association works to promote the status of retired people as useful members of the community.We're just discovering the delights of being retired.Retired footballers sometimes choose to become managers.The commission is headed by a retired police officer.
